entry.title: Personalized Ballerina Doll Backpack
entry.s:type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories > Personalized Infant & Toddler Backpacks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories > Personalized Infant & Toddler Backpacks
Price: 36.99

Buy any 2 items get 20% off. Personalize her own dollies now!

Personalized Leyadoll Doll Backpack (Ballerina) - 2 Skin Tones Available

Kindly Reminder for Doll Backpack Series:
1. The Doll is a detachable attachment to this backpack, NO NEED to purchase a separated doll.
2. The size of Backpack Dolly is a little bit smaller than the original Leya Dolls. 
3. ATTENTION: For Ballerina Leyadoll, the name can only be added to the hair due to the material of the dress.  

.

Gloveleya Doll Backpack, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream backpack to have. With spring girl’s signature smile, colorful and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect backpack for your baby to carry outside and inside.  

Craft

The size of the backpack is 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our backpack with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.

Personalized name backpack

One of the best features of our Gloveleya doll backpack is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll backpack a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  

Safety

Our Gloveleya doll backpack is uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our backpack out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our backpack has the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our backpack to be completely washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the backpack’s tag for easy reference.

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya doll backpack from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Shipping

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.
Estimated date of delivery:
Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 15-25 days 3-7 days
Canada 15-25 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

    Guarantee & Refund

    At leyadoll.com, we expect our customers to be 100% happy with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free ironclad 30-day guarantee. If you don't have a positive experience for any reason, we will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
    Should you decide you do not want to keep your product, you can return it to us in its original condition and packaging for an exchange or full refund. You have 30 days in which to return your item so you can shop at our site in complete confidence.

entry.title: Personalized Princess Moon Glow
entry.s:type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 33.99

NEW(Limited Edition) - Leyadoll Personalized Princess Moon Glow with Gift Bag

Personalized Doll with your baby's name! Now Available with Limited Stocks! 

About her: Princess Moon Glow, or you can call her Lady Moon Glow, is designed with awareness of Albinism. Her hair and skin white as snow display the unique beauty and elegance inside her. Swan is her favorite creature in the world because they have everything in common, such as hair colors and affections for night sky. 

Her favorite quote: We are destined to glow like the moon.

This Leyadoll would be a perfect gift with great educational benefits to help understand and support uncommon illnesses.

 Leyadoll Princess Moon Glow is every baby’s dream toy to have. Materials

We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush, and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton. With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

Safety

There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Leyadoll for your little one.
